title: Mastery Level 6
body: I got an S with  {{champion:24}}  (please don't judge) and I didn't get a mastery 6 token. I have Jax mastery level 5 (Again don't judge) so I don't know why I didn't get it.

replies.body:
{{champion:86}} YOU CAN'T TELL ME WHAT TO NOT JUDGE!

*spins furiously*

> [{quoted}](name=Decrit,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Qx8y14tO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-15T22:45:28.174+0000)
>
> {{champion:86}} YOU CAN'T TELL ME WHAT TO NOT JUDGE!
> 
> *spins furiously*

May his lamp post strike true!

Mastery tokens are currently only available on Summoner's Rift.  It's also not possible to receive a token at the same time you receive level 5.  We have a [Champion Mastery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)guide that can provide some more context on how the system works.  Hope that helps!
I actually didn't know that you couldn't receive a token in ARAM or other game modes, but I did get my S on summoner's rift and I got it before level 5. I will try to send a screenshot of it. Thanks!
I took a screenshot but I don't know how to send it.

When [submitting a ticket to player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), you may attach images and documents.  Unfortunately, the boards does not provide an attachment feature but you could use a site like imgur to upload one.

What game mode were you playing when you got this S rank? You can only get mastery tokens when playing normal or ranked Summoner's Rift matches. YOu will not be able to earn them while playing ARAM, Twisted Treeline, or any of the rotating game modes.
